Author: fbiiswatchingus
Text: check your bmr: [https://www.calculator.net/bmr-calculator.html?ctype=metric&cage=16&csex=f&cheightfeet=5&cheightinch=10&cpound=160&cheightmeter=160&ckg=56&cmop=0&coutunit=c&cformula=m&cfatpct=20&x=89&y=20](https://www.calculator.net/bmr-calculator.html?ctype=metric&cage=16&csex=f&cheightfeet=5&cheightinch=10&cpound=160&cheightmeter=160&ckg=56&cmop=0&coutunit=c&cformula=m&cfatpct=20&x=89&y=20)  &#x200B;  it varies for different body types, it's just an estimate for how many calories you should consume per day for your body to perform the normal functions it does everyday

Author: WilmaVilma
Text: Tw numbers   Personally I find that to not be preoccupied with food at all, I have to eat around 1000. That’s like where I can relax around food  To function, get stuff done but still spend all my free time on food and exercise stuff, it’s around 500-700. I can do that, not indefinitely but for a long time without suffering too much.   300 and below is where it become impossible for me to function aside from just laying in my bed and waiting for death to take me lol
